scripts.install: npm run install-server && npm run install-client
scripts.watch: npm run server & npm run client
scripts.watchwin: start cmd /k "npm run server" && npm run client
scripts.deploy: npm run buildv --prefix planetravel && npm start --prefix planetravelapis
scripts.deploy-cluster: npm run buildv --prefix planetravel && npm run cluster --prefix planetravelapis
scripts.test: npm test --prefix planetravelapis && npm test --prefix planetravel
